name: OpenOptionsPDF
shortdesc: Options which may be supplied when opening a PDF file.

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: pageToOpen
property.shortdesc: What page should be used when opening a multipage document (default: 1)

property.name: pDFCropToBox
property.shortdesc: What box should be used when placing a multipage document (default: PDF media box)
